name: karen hughes

name: Lisa Kantsos
text: My onions were burnt. The ham on my pizza was so tough I couldn't hardly chew it. It was more like jerky. But on the up side my cashier was very nice and courteous. Also my cheese was almost nonexistent.

name: Sarah Fields
text: I eat here when I go with my best friend since my father doesn't like the people that know it. It is okay but it's not the best.

name: Mrs Pippin
text: Good pizza and friendly staff. The only problem was they had a sign please wait to be seated so everyone is waiting in line just for them to tell you go find at seat anywhere you like. Other than that it was nice.

text: Delicious food, great service, and even better customer service. Had a little mix up with my order. When I noticed it when I got home and called they offered to either make a new one if I could come pick it up tonight or if I wasn't getting …More

text: Ever since Guy an Kathy left the food has been disgusting the food is either burnt or under cooked. An it took an hour an 15 minutes for my order because they forgot to fix it.

text: Their lunch special is unbeatable. Personal Pan pepperoni pizza (made to order), one-time visit to the salad bar, and a fountain Pepsi product for $7.

name: David Bond
text: Went to Pizza Hut for lunch yesterday as Pizza Plus was't going to be serving their bar but another thirty minutes or so. Have always got good food from Pizza Hut and this time was no different. The waitress was outstanding as well! She really made it a great visit and I will definitely be going back soon.
